TopicTitle: Duna and Ike Mission using a combination of SSTO, nuclear space tug, and lander/rover

Articles.Content:
This was originally done for the weekly challenge a while ago, but as it's more than a screenshot, I thought it would be an appropriate mission report.

For some added details, I wrote up some scripts in Kontrol System 2 for the ascent and landing of the SSTO.  That actually took quite a bit of time.
